Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.name: Invisibility
BGYUyh36nOQKX4Pr.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Succubus Form.name: Succubus Form
Succubus Form.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.aifSuccubus00000]{Succubus}, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Restless Touch.name: Restless Touch
Restless Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is cursed for 24 hours or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. Until the curse ends, the target gains no benefit from finishing Short Rests.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: The target is cursed for 24 hours or until the attacking creature dies. Until the curse ends, the target gains no benefit from finishing Short Rests.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRestlessTouch0]] attacks.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa]{Hypnotic Pattern}

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] feet.

Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for 1 hour, until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description:
You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot. You can perceive the plane you left, which looks gray, and you can't see anything there more than 60 feet away.

While on the Ethereal Plane, you can affect and be affected only by creatures, objects, and effects on that plane. Creatures that aren't on the Ethereal Plane can't perceive or interact with you unless a feature gives them the ability to do so.

When the spell ends, you return to the plane you left in the spot that corresponds to your space in the Border Ethereal. If you appear in an occupied space, you are shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and take Force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved.

This spell ends instantly if you cast it while you are on the Ethereal Plane or a plane that doesn't border it, such as one of the Outer Planes.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.You can target up to three willing creatures (including yourself) for each spell slot level above 7. The creatures must be within 10 feet of you when you cast the spell.

Dream.name: Dream
Dream.description:
You target a creature you know on the same plane of existence. You or a willing creature you touch enters a trance state to act as a dream messenger. While in the trance, the messenger is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] and has a Speed of 0.

If the target is asleep, the messenger appears in the target's dreams and can converse with the target as long as it remains asleep, through the spell's duration. The messenger can also shape the dream's environment, creating landscapes, objects, and other images. The messenger can emerge from the trance at any time, ending the spell. The target recalls the dream perfectly upon waking.

If the target is awake when you cast the spell, the messenger knows it and can either end the trance (and the spell) or wait for the target to sleep, at which point the messenger enters its dreams.

You can make the messenger terrifying to the target. If you do so, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words, and then the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and it takes 3d6 Psychic damage when it wakes up.

Trance State.name: Trance State
Trance State.description: While in the trance, the messenger is Incapacitated and has a Speed of 0.

Hypnotic Pattern.name: Hypnotic Pattern
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
You create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot Cube within range. The pattern appears for a moment and vanishes. Each creature in the area who can see the pattern must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. While Charmed, the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Hypnotized.name: Hypnotized
Hypnotized.description:
While &Reference[charmed apply=false], the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Claw]] attack and uses [[/item Devour Intellect]].

Detect Intelligence.name: Detect Intelligence
Detect Intelligence.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically senses the location of any creature within 300 feet of itself that has an Intelligence score of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers.

Devour Intellect.name: Devour Intellect
Devour Intellect.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Stunned.name: Stunned
Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Steal Body.name: Steal Body
Steal Body.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]]

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] possesses the target, consumes its brain, and teleports inside its skull.

While there, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; its understanding of Deep Speech; its telepathy; and its Detect Intelligence trait. It otherwise adopts the target’s game statistics. It knows everything the target knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must leave it. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

By spending 5 feet of its movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies unless its brain is restored before the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

affects.special: one Small or Medium creature within 5 feet that has the Incapacitated condition, is a Humanoid or Beast, and has 10 Hit Points or fewer.

Total Cover.name: Total Cover
Total Cover.description: The possessesing creature has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects originating outside its host.

Languages.name: Languages
Languages.description: The possessing creature retains its understanding of Deep Speech and its telepathy.

Fire Absorption.name: Fire Absorption
Fire Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Fire damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Fire damage dealt.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attack, using [[/item Bladed Arm]] or [[/item Fiery Bolt]] in any combination.

Poison Breath.name: Poison Breath
Poison Breath.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Karas Chembryl.name: Karas Chembryl
Karas Chembryl.description:
Assassin Heir to a Sinister Legacy

After the death of patriarch Fzoul Chembryl, House Chembryl and its descendants were scattered across Faerûn. Some members have dutifully continued the family’s dedication to Bane, while others have sought to free themselves from that god’s malignant shadow. However, none have embraced the Chembryls’ tyrannical legacy more than Karas Chembryl, a ruthless assassin whose devotion to the gods Bane, Bhaal, and Myrkul has earned her the title Auspice of the Dead Three.

History

Karas was born to a distant branch of the Chembryl family living in Waterdeep. Though that side of the family had long since abandoned service of Bane, Karas began to exhibit signs of that god’s blessing: a callous silver-tongue, an unnaturally intimidating presence, and an affinity for occult magic. Out of fear, Karas’s parents discouraged her from using her gifts, hiding their family’s history and pressuring the girl toward a pretense of normalcy.

Restless and dissatisfied with her life, Karas fell in league with the Zhentarim. When her surname sparked recognition among the elder Zhents, she began researching her lineage, eventually uncovering the stories of Fzoul Chembryl. Karas grew furious at her family for hiding the truth and embraced her gifts as a scion of Bane.

Within a few years, Karas became a fearsome assassin and high-ranking member of the Zhentarim. Her travels across Faerûn led her to uncover Bane’s relationship with Bhaal and Myrkul. Feeling kinship with the oft-maligned gods, Karas pledged herself to the Dead Three. She now operates primarily out of Baldur’s Gate, where she strives to uncover remnants of Bane, Bhaal, and Myrkul’s might hidden in and around the bustling city.

Personality

Ruthless and fiercely independent, Karas craves power in all its forms. She wields her words with the same cunning as she does her blades, frequently luring opponents into underestimating her before striking unseen.

Though she is a member of the Zhentarim, Karas cares little for the organization’s hierarchy and family dynamics. Karas views leadership of the Zhentarim as her birthright and hopes that, by amassing power from the Dead Three, she can one day overthrow the Pereghost, the leader of the Zhentarim, and claim what is rightfully hers.

Karas Chembryl’s Lair

Karas operates from a hideout deep beneath the city of Baldur’s Gate. The hideout contains shrines to the Dead Three and her research about lore or Artifacts related to those gods. Only Karas’s most trusted confidantes know her hideout’s location.

Karas extends her connection to the Dead Three into the region she inhabits, creating the following effects:

Creeping Dread. Terror runs rampant in Karas’s domain. Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures other than members of the Zhentarim and cultists of Bane, Bhaal, or Myrkul have Disadvantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Frightened condition.

Death’s Lore. When a Humanoid dies within 1 mile of the lair, Karas learns one secret that the Humanoid knew.

If Karas dies or moves her lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Using Karas Chembryl

Karas Chembryl is a solid choice for a final villain in a low-level Baldur’s Gate campaign or in any campaign centered around the Dead Three or the Zhentarim. Characters might hear about her atrocities, seek out information about her unsavory connections, and then battle through cultists and Zhentarim defenders to confront her.

In a longer campaign, Karas might be a mid-campaign threat who maintains a delicate relationship with other fervent followers of the Dead Three, such as the powerful cultists presented in this chapter. A Dead Three Scion, also presented in this chapter, might be the mastermind in such a campaign, manipulating Karas and others to topple civilization into wickedness.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
Karas casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: [[/item .AfqJtnfQ9uV1OoFy]]{Friends}, [[/item .OJmOZDQA0w4P2i7u]]{Silence}, [[/item .cx68EDj6uvGMEpsF]]{Thaumaturgy}

2/Day: [[/item .ZYRZf2mrr8VD3B05]]{Ray of Sickness} (level 5 version)

1/Day: [[/item .nX4AVCKKS5vAeV3y]]{Blight}, [[/item .WajrXR8vU569sYaM]]{Mislead}

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Karas makes two attacks using [[/item Dread Dagger]] or [[/item Tyrant’s Blade]] in any combination.

Dread Dagger.name: Dread Dagger
Dread Dagger.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

Hit or Miss: The dagger magically returns to Karas’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Tyrant’s Blade.name: Tyrant’s Blade
Tyrant’s Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of Karas’s next turn. If the target is already Frightened, it instead takes [[/damage average activity=U5Ibx1agxS8YYgjZ]] damage.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: You are &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of Karas’s next turn.

Legendary Actions.name: Legendary Actions
Legendary Actions.description:
Legendary Action Uses: 3 (4 in Lair).

Immediately after another creature’s turn, Karas can expend a use to take one of the following actions. Karas regains all expended uses at the start of each of her turns.

Harrow.name: Harrow
Harrow.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FQlisLWYBB3ffjOo]], one creature Karas can see within 90 feet of herself.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute. While Frightened, the target’s Speed is 0 feet, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

Failure or Success: Karas can’t take this action again until the start of her next turn.

Frightened | 0 ft. Movement.name: Frightened | 0 ft. Movement
Frightened | 0 ft. Movement.description: You are &Reference[Frightened apply=false] for 1 minute. While Frightened, your Speed is 0 feet, and you can repeat the save at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Stealth Attack.name: Stealth Attack
Stealth Attack.description: Karas makes one [[/item Dread Dagger]] attack and uses [[/item Withdraw]].

Withdraw.name: Withdraw
Withdraw.description: Karas moves up to half her Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks] and takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
Studded Leather Armor.description: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Karas is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Karas instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the save and only half damage if she fails. She can’t use this trait if she has the Incapacitated condition.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.description: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the Sphere has Immunity to Thunder damage, and creatures have the &Reference[deafened apply=false] condition while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a Verbal component is impossible there.

Silenced.name: Silenced
Silenced.description: Any creature or object entirely inside the Sphere has Immunity to Thunder damage, and creatures have the Deafened condition while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a Verbal component is impossible there.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Ray of Sickness.name: Ray of Sickness
Ray of Sickness.description:
You shoot a greenish ray at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 Poison damage and has the &Reference[poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Blight.name: Blight
Blight.description:
A creature that you can see within range makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A Plant creature automatically fails the save.

Alternatively, target a nonmagical plant that isn't a creature, such as a tree or shrub. It doesn't make a save; it simply withers and dies.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 4.

Mislead.name: Mislead
Mislead.description:
You gain the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition at the same time that an illusory double of you appears where you are standing. The double lasts for the duration, but the invisibility ends immediately after you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.

As a Magic action, you can move the illusory double up to twice your Speed and make it gesture, speak, and behave in whatever way you choose. It is intangible and invulnerable.

You can see through its eyes and hear through its ears as if you were located where it is.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The &Reference[invisible apply=false] immediately after you make an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If Karas fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Friends.name: Friends
Friends.description:
You magically emanate a sense of friendship toward one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target succeeds automatically if it isn’t a Humanoid, if you’re fighting it, or if you have cast this spell on it within the past 24 hours.

The spell ends early if the target takes damage or if you make an attack roll, deal damage, or force anyone to make a saving throw. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The spell ends early if the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target takes damage or if you make an attack roll, deal damage, or force anyone to make a saving throw. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful [[/check format=long]].

Shadow Blade.name: Shadow Blade
Shadow Blade.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Hit or Miss: The blade magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Eldritch Lantern.name: Eldritch Lantern
Eldritch Lantern.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
Faerie Fire.description:
施法距离内一处 20 尺立方区域内每个物件都将被蓝色、绿色、或紫色的光所包围（颜色由你指定）。区域内的生物则必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败时也会被光线勾勒出轮廓。受术物件和生物在法术持续时间内发出 10 尺半径的&Reference[dimlight]。

受术生物或物件无法受益于隐形状态，且任何能看见他们的攻击者对其发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Outlined.name: Outlined
Outlined.description:
你的某种颜色的光所包围，在法术持续时间内发出 10 尺半径的&Reference[dimlight]，受术生物或物件无法受益于隐形状态。

任何能看见你的攻击者对你发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Hold Breath.name: Hold Breath
Hold Breath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

Knight.name: Knight
Knight.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepHeavyCross]{Heavy Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]{Plate Armor}

Knights

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.G5uYpVQgKpPIkFQY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Knight

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.8ypc00V48Je5p3JY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .qFzUqCv1LU1T2l9W]] or [[/item .iqOpigRADMF7BFDu]] in any combination.

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Use.name: Use
Use.condition: hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon

Kobold Warrior.name: Kobold Warrior
Kobold Warrior.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers (3)}

Kobolds

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.NC8c3St0SoWBP6K8 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Kobold Warrior

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.khL20BavkkD4YZGY caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Kraken.name: Kraken
Kraken.description:
Kraken

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.bFoBpRe9ScqLJa1Z caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Kraken Lairs

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.TxjnUlcNFpCq9w0l caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对物件和建筑物造成双倍伤害。

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmTentacle000000]] attacks and uses [[/item .mmFling000000000]], [[/item .mmLightningStrik]], or [[/item .mmSwallow0000000]].

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of ten tentacles, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) from one of ten tentacles, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Escape Tests (see origin item for DC)

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]] Grappled by it to a space it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]] feet of itself [[lookup @range.special activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]], the creature thrown and each creature in the destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (it can have up to four creatures swallowed at a time).

Failure: [[/damage average activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is swallowed and no longer Grappled. A swallowed creature has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

affects.special: one Large or smaller creature Grappled

Restrained & Total Cover.name: Restrained & Total Cover
Restrained & Total Cover.description: While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, has &Reference[Total Cover apply=false] against attacks.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If you are regurgitated, you fall into a space within 10 ft. and are &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Escape: Prone.name: Escape: Prone
Escape: Prone.description: Any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Toxic Ink.name: Toxic Ink
Toxic Ink.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is underwater.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then moves up to its Speed.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Blinded & Poisoned.name: Blinded & Poisoned
Blinded & Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Kuo-toa.name: Kuo-toa
Kuo-toa.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}

Kuo-toa

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5cWxPFYWZSjJw6ih caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Kuo-toa

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.XEDbrbc4fOsasH55 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Sticky Shield.name: Sticky Shield
Sticky Shield.description:
Trigger: A creature misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack roll using a weapon. Response—Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A8a55LxaAvNmIUnj]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack’s weapon sticks to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s shield. If the target doesn’t let go of the weapon, the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition while the weapon is stuck (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). While stuck, the weapon can’t be used. The target can take an action to make a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]], freeing the weapon on a success.

Save.name: Save
Save.condition: A creature misses the kuo-toa with a melee attack roll using a weapon.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target doesn’t let go of the weapon, the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition while the weapon is stuck (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC)

Sticky Net.name: Sticky Net
Sticky Net.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] the kuo-toa can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the net is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage). A creature can take an action to make a [[/skill ath 10]] check to free itself or another creature in a net within 5 feet, destroying the net on a success.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the net is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage). A creature can make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check to free itself or another creature in a net within 5 feet, destroying the net on a success.

Kuo-toa Monitor.name: Kuo-toa Monitor
Kuo-toa Monitor.description:
Kuo-toa

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.5cWxPFYWZSjJw6ih caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Kuo-toa Monitor

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.N6Prinvb9ppnSZub caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]
