Poison Spray.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ’s next turn. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Poisoned & Blinded.name: Poisoned & Blinded
Poisoned & Blinded.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition.

Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).name: Spellcasting  (Yuan-ti Form Only)
Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship} (snakes only)

3/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion}

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Large snake or returns to its true form. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Animal Friendship.name: Animal Friendship
Animal Friendship.description:
Target a Beast that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. If you or one of your allies deals damage to the target, the spells ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional Beast for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. If you or one of your allies deals damage to the target, the spells ends.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, “Fetch the key to the cult’s treasure vault, and give the key to me.” Or you could say, “Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don’t return.”

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] or [[/item .mmPoisonRay00000]]{Poison Ray} in any combination, and it can use Spellcasting to cast [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.AKHk1UYi7K8g8ct4]] if available.

Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).name: Spellcasting  (Yuan-ti Form Only)
Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only).description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship} (snakes only)

2/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion}

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Medium snake or returns to its true form. If it dies, it stays in its current form. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Animal Friendship.name: Animal Friendship
Animal Friendship.description:
Target a Beast that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. If you or one of your allies deals damage to the target, the spells ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional Beast for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. If you or one of your allies deals damage to the target, the spells ends.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, “Fetch the key to the cult’s treasure vault, and give the key to me.” Or you could say, “Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don’t return.”

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Zhentilar Paladin of Bane.name: Zhentilar Paladin of Bane
Zhentilar Paladin of Bane.description:
Wardens of the Zhentarim

The Zhentilar is the militant wing of the Zhentarim. Zhentilar forces occupy Zhentarim strongholds such as Zhentil Keep and Darkhold and defend these places from the Zhentarim’s many enemies. If the Zhentarim is one big family, then the Zhentilar are the protective older siblings who look out for their kin.

Zhentilar also conduct other important organizational work such as safeguarding powerful magic items or escorting Zhentarim leaders.

Zhentilar Paladin of Bane

The Zhentilar’s most-respected commanders and sergeants tend to be spellswords or holy warriors who worship nefarious higher powers, such as Bane.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The Zhentilar casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

1/Day Each: [[/item .64SbftzAZ2mGg4ES]]{Command}, [[/item .S2JSRwi8unLMH53K]]{Fear}

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Zhentilar makes three attacks, using [[/item Dooming Blade]] or [[/item Oppressive Ray]] in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Spellcasting]].

Aura of Dread.name: Aura of Dread
Aura of Dread.description: Creatures in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1L9BTG2gW41igvlP]]-foot Emanation originating from the Zhentilar have their Speeds halved while in the Emanation. The Zhentilar can designate creatures to be unaffected by the aura.

Speed Halved.name: Speed Halved
Speed Halved.description: The target’s Speed is halved, it can’t take Reactions, and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description:
30 尺锥状区域内的所有生物必须成功于一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将丢弃其所有持握物，并在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。

以此法被恐慌的生物必须在其回合内执行 &Reference[dash] 动作，并以此寻找最安全的路线远离你，直至其无路可走为止。如果该生物结束其回合时位于一处使其视觉线中没有你的空间，则其可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则法术对该生物的效应终止。

Fear.name: 恐惧
Fear.description: 在法术持续时间内，你陷入&Reference[frightened apply=false]{恐慌}状态。你必须在回合内执行 &Reference[dash]{疾走}动作，并以此寻找最安全的路线远离施法者，直至其无路可走为止。如果你结束回合时位于一处使其视觉线中没有施法者的空间，则你可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则法术对该效应终止。

Zhentilar Soldier.name: Zhentilar Soldier
Zhentilar Soldier.description:
Wardens of the Zhentarim

The Zhentilar is the militant wing of the Zhentarim. Zhentilar forces occupy Zhentarim strongholds such as Zhentil Keep and Darkhold and defend these places from the Zhentarim’s many enemies. If the Zhentarim is one big family, then the Zhentilar are the protective older siblings who look out for their kin.

Zhentilar also conduct other important organizational work such as safeguarding powerful magic items or escorting Zhentarim leaders.

Zhentilar Soldier

Zhentilar soldiers occupy Zhentarim fortresses and outposts. The price of betraying the organization is so steep that many Zhentilar soldiers would rather die for the Zhentarim than abandon their post.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Zhentilar makes two attacks, using [[/item Shortsword]] or [[/item Pistol]] in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Knock Down]].

Knock Down.name: Knock Down
Knock Down.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=n4Ap1pDq7m4pWEBo]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=n4Ap1pDq7m4pWEBo]] feet that the Zhentilar can see.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Zlan.name: Zlan
Zlan.description:
Scheming Lich in a Monstrous, Frozen Form

Zlan is a horrid, icy amalgamation of the seven liches who created the Artifact Crenshinibon, better known as the Crystal Shard. Zlan Clervish was one of those seven liches, and that lich’s will predominates in the fused entity. All seven bodies are frozen together with ice and black crystal called chardalyn, fragments of the shattered Crystal Shard.

Zlan has leveraged its connection with the shattered Artifact to psychically infest chardalyn, using the crystalline material to observe enemies and warp minds.

History

Seven powerful liches from other worlds came together to create the Crystal Shard millennia ago. Although the liches were jealous and suspicious of each other, their combined power was sufficient to create the sentient Artifact. The Crystal Shard absorbed its creators’ minds, which resonated within the crystal of the Crystal Shard thereafter. When the Crystal Shard was destroyed, its fragments, called chardalyn, still echoed with its creators’ malevolent minds. Fragments of ice and chardalyn drew together around the remains of the seven liches, creating an amalgamated form.

Zlan is the foremost mind among the liches and controls the body, The other liches rage and scheme about being subsidiary to someone they once considered both a rival and an equal. The Zlan Liches table gives a brief description of each component.

Zlan Liches

NameHistory
Argent BlackEmerged from the Negative Plane, fed on hate and darkness
FetchigrolAbused authority as a spiritual leader to trade souls for power
First Grandfather WuUnleashed a magical contagion that killed a world of billions
Solmé of GharrDevoured the souls of children to occupy their bodies
Vaeristhelph RexSeized power as a wizard-king, traded his throne for lichdom
Vlad Xil HaervenWallowed in greed and traded lives for wealth
Zlan ClervishCurrently in control, aims to expose hidden horrors and ruins beneath Icewind Dale

Personality

Zlan has an affinity for enchantment and corrupting minds. During the time he was working to create the Crystal Shard, Zlan was a devotee of a god of darkness, confusion, and pain. Zlan likes to subtly twist minds to confusion and paranoia and doesn’t take direct action when an oblique or hidden action will suffice. Its plans always contain fallbacks and contingencies. One of these contingencies—one the other liches who constitute its new form failed to foresee—was to assume control of the other liches if Crystal Shard was destroyed and created the multi-lich entity.

Zlan schemes about how to restore and control Crystal Shard’s power through the accumulation of chardalyn from across Icewind Dale. Zlan’s affinity with chardalyn allows it to access information across the region and use chardalyn to corrupt those who could prove useful.

Zlan’s current plan is to heat Icewind Dale from below, warming the Underdark to melt its ice and release aberrant terrors from frozen stasis. This melting also exposes ancient sites containing power Zlan needs to enforce its wicked will on the region.

Using Zlan

Zlan is an unsettling monstrosity of ice, black crystal, and alien dead. The characters should see Zlan long before they confront him, crawling across the icy wastes in pursuit of some mysterious goal. Tales of Zlan’s bizarre power and unsettling psychic influence should reach the characters, making Zlan seem like a terrible, eldritch entity.

Zlan’s eerie connection to chardalyn allows him to spread his mental influence to the characters’ friends and enemies alike, and perhaps even to the characters themselves. You can use chardalyn’s psychic resonance to give the characters brief, confusing glimpses of Zlan’s plans to propel the plot.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
Zlan casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .KniCMHcejcO6Xn0w]]{Detect Magic}, [[/item .vNWWxnsYWHIx6kTQ]]{Detect Thoughts}, [[/item .KniCMHcejcO6Xn0w]]{Detect Magic}, [[/item .uZjqZvSeOKw4yYuP]]{Mage Hand}, [[/item .mZzhkUbBlEzen6zQ]]{Message}

2/Day Each: [[/item .jG2LJP62sTS2u27A]]{Dimension Door}, [[/item .HlB5DXrnStyg6fWB]]{Fly}, [[/item .yYYBE04Xt6iph2h8]]{Scrying}

1/Day Each: [[/item .wY5Ob9P2BYeMQ5a4]]{Befuddlement}, [[/item .BO8TTCLVcCV3FwAo]]{Disintegrate}

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zlan makes three attacks, using [[/item Slam]] or [[/item Bewildering Bolt]] in any combination. It can replace two attacks with a use of [[/item Spellcasting]].

Bewildering Bolt.name: Bewildering Bolt
Bewildering Bolt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]., and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Retaliation.name: Retaliation
Retaliation.description: Zlan makes one [[/item Slam]] or [[/item Bewildering Bolt]] attack.

Stoke Paranoia.name: Stoke Paranoia
Stoke Paranoia.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], one creature Zlan can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Xi4VfSJc6OACgri5]] feet (with Disadvantage if the target is holding or wearing chardalyn).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for 1 minute or until Zlan dies. While Charmed, the target doesn’t act as an ally to any creature.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: Zlan can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target is &Reference[Charmed apply=false] for 1 minute or until Zlan dies. While Charmed, the target doesn’t act as an ally to any creature.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: Zlan casts [[/item .OGM5CJVm6FfENdRJ]]{Counterspell} in response to the spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Chardalyn Sense.name: Chardalyn Sense
Chardalyn Sense.description: Zlan senses the emotions of anyone touching a piece of chardalyn within 100 miles of itself.

Next of the Seven (6/Year).name: Next of the Seven (6/Year)
Next of the Seven (6/Year).description: If Zlan dies within 100 miles of a piece of chardalyn at least 4 inches long, it re-forms from that piece of chardalyn in [[/r 1d10]] days, regaining all its Hit Points. The new body appears in the unoccupied space nearest to the piece of chardalyn, and another lich’s mind in the body seizes psychic control of the body.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don't read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target's mind right now. If the target doesn't know any languages and isn't telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target's mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target's reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target's mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell's level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell's level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Message.name: Message
Message.description:
You point toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear.

You can cast this spell through solid objects if you are familiar with the target and know it is beyond the barrier. Magical silence; 1 foot of stone, metal, or wood; or a thin sheet of lead blocks the spell.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Scrying.name: Scrying
Scrying.description:
You can see and hear a creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, which is modified (see the tables below) by how well you know the target and the sort of physical connection you have to it. The target doesn't know what it is making the save against, only that it feels uneasy.

Your Knowledge of the Target Is …Save Modifier
Secondhand (heard of the target)+5
Firsthand (met the target)+0
Extensive (know the target well)−5
You Have the Target's …Save Modifier
Picture or other likeness−2
Garment or other possession−4
Body part, lock of hair, or bit of nail−10

On a successful save, the target isn't affected, and you can't use this spell on it again for 24 hours.

On a failed save, the spell creates an Invisible, intangible sensor within 10 feet of the target. You can see and hear through the sensor as if you were there. The sensor moves with the target, remaining within 10 feet of it for the duration. If something can see the sensor, it appears as a luminous orb about the size of your fist.

Instead of targeting a creature, you can target a location you have seen. When you do so, the sensor appears at that location and doesn't move.

materials.value: a focus worth 1,000+ GP, such as a crystal ball, mirror, or water-filled font

affects.special: creature on same plane of existence or a location you have seen
at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Befuddlement.name: Befuddlement
Befuddlement.description:
You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range. The target makes an Intelligence saving throw.

On a failed save, the target takes 10d12 Psychic damage and can't cast spells or take the Magic action. At the end of every 30 days, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on a success. The effect can also be ended by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

materials.value: a key ring with no keys

Befuddled.name: Befuddled
Befuddled.description: On a failed save, the target takes 10d12 Psychic damage and can’t cast spells or take the Magic action. At the end of every 30 days, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the effect on a success. The effect can also be ended by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

Disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate.description:
You launch a green ray at a target you can see within range. The target can be a creature, a nonmagical object, or a creation of magical force, such as the wall created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofForc]{Wall of Force}.

A creature targeted by this spell makes a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 10d6 + 40 Force damage. If this damage reduces it to 0 Hit Points, it and everything nonmagical it is wearing and carrying are disintegrated into gray dust. The target can be revived only by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTrueResurr]{True Resurrection} or a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

This spell automatically disintegrates a Large or smaller nonmagical object or a creation of magical force. If such a target is Huge or larger, this spell disintegrates a 10-foot-Cube portion of it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 3d6 for each spell slot level above 6.

affects.special: a creature, a nonmagical object, or a creation of magical force,

OGM5CJVm6FfENdRJ.name: Counterspell
OGM5CJVm6FfENdRJ.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

activation.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

Legendary Actions.name: Legendary Actions
Legendary Actions.description:
Legendary Action Uses: 3

Immediately after another creature’s turn, [[lookup @name]] can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The dragon regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Undead Fortitude.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes 3 [[/item Mutating Claw]] attacks.

Mutating Claw.name: Mutating Claw
Mutating Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zy66rXdo6Mo4E9bO]].

Failure: The target is cursed. The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

If the curse reduces the target’s Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmRedSlaad000000]{Red Slaad} or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGreenSlaad0000]{Green Slaad}. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can reverse this transformation.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description:
On failing a Constitution save, the target is cursed.

The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

Limited Foresight.name: Limited Foresight
Limited Foresight.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see makes an attack roll against it.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] imposes Disadvantage on the roll, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: A creature the cyclops can see makes an attack roll against it.

Elemental Restoration.name: Elemental Restoration
Elemental Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Elemental Plane of Air, its body dissolves into dirt, and it gains a new body in [[/r 1d4#Days]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Air.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Wishes.name: Wishes
Wishes.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30 percent} chance of knowing the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can understand. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the spell for the creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has cast it three times, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't do so again for 365 days.

Wish.name: Wish
Wish.description:
Wish is the mightiest spell a mortal can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter reality itself.

The basic use of this spell is to duplicate any other spell of level 8 or lower. If you use it this way, you don't need to meet any requirements to cast that spell, including costly components. The spell simply takes effect.

Alternatively, you can create one of the following effects of your choice:

Object Creation. You create one object of up to 25,000 GP in value that isn't a magic item. The object can be no more than 300 feet in any dimension, and it appears in an unoccupied space that you can see on the ground.

Instant Health. You allow yourself and up to twenty creatures that you can see to regain all Hit Points, and you end all effects on them listed in the Greater Restoration spell.

Resistance. You grant up to ten creatures that you can see Resistance to one damage type that you choose. This Resistance is permanent.

Spell Immunity. You grant up to ten creatures you can see immunity to a single spell or other magical effect for 8 hours.

Sudden Learning. You replace one of your feats with another feat for which you are eligible. You lose all the benefits of the old feat and gain the benefits of the new one. You can't replace a feat that is a prerequisite for any of your other feats or features.

Roll Redo. You undo a single recent event by forcing a reroll of any die roll made within the last round (including your last turn). Reality reshapes itself to accommodate the new result. For example, a Wish spell could undo an ally's failed saving throw or a foe's Critical Hit. You can force the reroll to be made with Advantage or Disadvantage, and you choose whether to use the reroll or the original roll.

Reshape Reality. You may wish for something not included in any of the other effects. To do so, state your wish to the DM as precisely as possible. The DM has great latitude in ruling what occurs in such an instance; the greater the wish, the greater the likelihood that something goes wrong. This spell might simply fail, the effect you desire might be achieved only in part, or you might suffer an unforeseen consequence as a result of how you worded the wish. For example, wishing that a villain were dead might propel you forward in time to a period when that villain is no longer alive, effectively removing you from the game. Similarly, wishing for a Legendary magic item or an Artifact might instantly transport you to the presence of the item's current owner. If your wish is granted and its effects have consequences for a whole community, region, or world, you are likely to attract powerful foes. If your wish would affect a god, the god's divine servants might instantly intervene to prevent it or to encourage you to craft the wish in a particular way. If your wish would undo the multiverse itself, threaten the City of Sigil, or affect the Lady of Pain in any way, you see an image of her in your mind for a moment; she shakes her head, and your wish fails.

The stress of casting Wish to produce any effect other than duplicating another spell weakens you. After enduring that stress, each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take 1d10 Necrotic damage per level of that spell. This damage can't be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for 2d4 days. For each of those days that you spend resting and doing nothing more than light activity, your remaining recovery time decreases by 2 days. Finally, there is a [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33 percent chance} that you are unable to cast Wish ever again if you suffer this stress.

Wish Stress.name: Wish Stress
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .mmStormBlade0000]] or [[/item .mmStormBolt00000]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectEvil]{Detect Evil and Good}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCreateFood]{Create Food and Water} (can create wine instead of water), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWindWalk00]{Wind Walk}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCreation00]{Creation}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}

Detect Evil and Good.name: Detect Evil and Good
Detect Evil and Good.description:
For the duration, you sense the location of any Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead within 30 feet of yourself. You also sense whether the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell is active there and, if so, where.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Create Food and Water.name: Create Food and Water
Create Food and Water.description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of fresh water on the ground or in containers within range—both useful in fending off the hazards of malnutrition and dehydration. The food is bland but nourishing and looks like a food of your choice, and the water is clean. The food spoils after 24 hours if uneaten.

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Wind Walk.name: Wind Walk
Wind Walk.description:
You and up to ten willing creatures of your choice within range assume gaseous forms for the duration, appearing as wisps of cloud. While in this cloud form, a target has a Fly Speed of 300 feet and can hover; it has Immunity to the Prone condition; and it has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. The only actions a target can take in this form are the &Reference[Dash] action or a Magic action to begin reverting to its normal form. Reverting takes 1 minute, during which the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition. Until the spell ends, the target can revert to cloud form, which also requires a Magic action followed by a 1-minute transformation.

If a target is in cloud form and flying when the effect ends, the target descends 60 feet per round for 1 minute until it lands, which it does safely. If it can't land after 1 minute, it falls the remaining distance.

affects.special: you and up to ten other creatures

Cloud Form.name: Cloud Form
Cloud Form.description: The only actions a target can take in this form are the &Reference[Dash] action or a Magic action to begin reverting to its normal form. Reverting takes 1 minute, during which the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition. Until the spell ends, the target can revert to cloud form, which also requires a Magic action followed by a 1-minute transformation.

Creation.name: Creation
Creation.description:
You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create an object within range. It is either an object of vegetable matter (soft goods, rope, wood, and the like) or mineral matter (stone, crystal, metal, and the like). The object must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube, and the object must be of a form and material that you have seen.

The spell's duration depends on the object's material, as shown in the Materials table. If the object is composed of multiple materials, use the shortest duration. Using any object created by this spell as another spell's Material component causes the other spell to fail.

MaterialDuration
Vegetable matter24 hours
Stone or crystal12 hours
Precious metals1 hour
Gems10 minutes
Adamantine or mithral1 minute

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Cube increases by 5 feet for each spell slot level above 5.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
A willing creature you touch shape-shifts, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends on the target if it drops to 0 Hit Points or if it takes a Magic action to end the spell on itself.

While in this form, the target's only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can't talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can't be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can't attack or cast spells.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
The target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

affects.special: you and up to eight willing creatures

Create Whirlwind.name: Create Whirlwind
Create Whirlwind.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a whirlwind at a point it can see within 120 feet. The whirlwind fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-high [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] centered on that point. The whirlwind lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Concentration on it ends. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns.

Whenever the whirlwind enters a creature's space or a creature enters the whirlwind, that creature is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] (a creature makes this save only once per turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected).

Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes [[/damage average]] damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description:
The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind.

At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Storm Bolt.name: Storm Bolt
Storm Bolt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Elemental Restoration.name: Elemental Restoration
Elemental Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @item.requirements]], its body dissolves into dirt, and it gains a new body in [[/r 1d4#Days]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Fire.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Wishes.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30 percent} chance of knowing the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .mmHeatedBlade000]] or [[/item .mmHurlFlame00000]] in any combination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplElementali]{Elementalism}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGaseousFor]{Gaseous Form}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire} (level 7 version)

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Elementalism.name: Elementalism
Elementalism.description:
You exert control over the elements, creating one of the following effects within range.

Beckon Air. You create a breeze strong enough to ripple cloth, stir dust, rustle leaves, and close open doors and shutters, all in a 5-foot Cube. Doors and shutters being held open by someone or something aren't affected.

Beckon Earth. You create a thin shroud of dust or sand that covers surfaces in a 5-foot-square area, or you cause a single word to appear in your handwriting in a patch of dirt or sand.

Beckon Fire. You create a thin cloud of harmless embers and colored, scented smoke in a 5-foot Cube. You choose the color and scent, and the embers can light candles, torches, or lamps in that area. The smoke's scent lingers for 1 minute.

Beckon Water. You create a spray of cool mist that lightly dampens creatures and objects in a 5-foot Cube. Alternatively, you create 1 cup of clean water either in an open container or on a surface, and the water evaporates in 1 minute.

Sculpt Element. You cause dirt, sand, fire, smoke, mist, or water that can fit in a 1-foot Cube to assume a crude shape (such as that of a creature) for 1 hour.

Beckon Element.name: Beckon Element
Beckon Element.chatFlavor: Fire and water beckoning lasts for 1 minute

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
A willing creature you touch shape-shifts, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends on the target if it drops to 0 Hit Points or if it takes a Magic action to end the spell on itself.

While in this form, the target's only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can't talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can't be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can't attack or cast spells.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Gaseous Form.name: Gaseous Form
Gaseous Form.description:
The target’s only method of movement is a Fly Speed of 10 feet, and it can hover. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; it has Immunity to the &Reference[prone apply=false] condition; and it has Advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through narrow openings, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces.

The target can’t talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can’t be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. Finally, the target can’t attack or cast spells.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

affects.special: you and up to eight willing creatures

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Wall of Fire.name: Wall of Fire
Wall of Fire.description:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature in its area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d8 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 Fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 4.

Gray Slaad.name: Gray Slaad
Gray Slaad.description:
Slaadi

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.AXXqca9xNbd6xnJ6 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Gray Slaad

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

heal.condition: starts its turn with at least 1 Hit Point

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Chaos Claw]] attacks.

Chaos Claw.name: Chaos Claw
Chaos Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a 1, &Reference[Charmed apply=false]; on a 2, &Reference[Frightened apply=false]; on a 3, &Reference[Poisoned apply=false]; or on a 4, &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false].

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMajorImage]{Major Image}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCloudkill0]{Cloudkill}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{Plane Shift} (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTongues000]{Tongues}

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Detect Thoughts.name: Detect Thoughts
Detect Thoughts.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Cloudkill.name: Cloudkill
Cloudkill.description:
You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of yellow-green fog centered on a point within range. The fog lasts for the duration or until strong wind (such as the one created by Gust of Wind) disperses it, ending the spell. Its area is Heavily Obscured.

Each creature in the Sphere makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 5d8 Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this save when the Sphere moves into its space and when it enters the Sphere or ends its turn there. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

The Sphere moves 10 feet away from you at the start of each of your turns.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

affects.special: you and up to eight willing creatures

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=EU2q25V5hIaM1ZlR]], or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

affects.special: shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
明亮的闪光从你的指间飞驰向施法距离内你指定的一点，并随着一声低吼迸成一片烈焰。目标点周围半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 8d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

区域内所有未被着装或携带的可燃物件会开始燃烧。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

materials.value: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]]{Rend} or [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]]{Slam} attacks.

Rend (Jackal or Hybrid Form Only).name: 撕裂（仅胡狼与半人形态）

Sleep Gaze.name: Sleep Gaze
Sleep Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] feet (Constructs and Undead succeed automatically).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @labels.duration activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sleep Gaze for 24 hours.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for the duration (see source item for the length of the duration) or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Medium human or a Medium jackal-humanoid hybrid, or it returns to its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

Running Leap.name: Running Leap
Running Leap.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .mmRoar0000000000]].

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Water Bound.name: Water Bound
Water Bound.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

Invisible in Water.name: Invisible in Water
Invisible in Water.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Invisible] condition while fully immersed in water.

Surge.name: Surge
Surge.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.
